parks.name: Acadia
parks.description: You're drawn to moody, dramatic coastlines and love catching that perfect sunrise. You thrive in social settings but appreciate moments of introspection by the water.

parks.name: American Samoa
parks.description: You're a true adventurer who seeks untouched, remote places where culture and nature intertwine. The tropics call to you, and you're not afraid to go off the beaten path.

parks.name: Arches
parks.description: You're iconic and unforgettable, with a flair for the dramatic. You love wide-open spaces and golden hour magic, and you're not afraid to stand out from the crowd.

parks.name: Badlands
parks.description: You're underrated and full of hidden depths. You embrace stark beauty and aren't afraid of a little grit—you know that the most interesting landscapes aren't always the easiest.

parks.name: Big Bend
parks.description: You're resilient and thrive in remote, challenging environments. You've got serious grit and love the expansive feeling of being truly away from it all.

parks.name: Biscayne
parks.description: You're calm and aquatic at heart, drawn to hidden gems that others might overlook. You love the water and prefer peaceful, serene environments over crowded scenes.

parks.name: Black Canyon of the Gunnison
parks.description: You're intense and dramatic, unafraid of vertigo-inducing challenges. You thrive in remote places that demand grit and respect—shallow experiences aren't your thing.

parks.name: Bryce Canyon
parks.description: You're whimsical and otherworldly, with an appreciation for delicate beauty. You love socializing but also enjoy the unique and unusual—you see magic where others see rocks.

parks.name: Canyonlands
parks.description: You're vast and rugged, preferring solitude over crowds. You've got the grit to handle harsh environments and the soul to appreciate raw, untamed beauty.

parks.name: Capitol Reef
parks.description: You're a quiet, balanced soul who seeks hidden gems away from the tourist crowds. You appreciate subtle beauty and don't need everyone to understand your vibe.

parks.name: Carlsbad Caverns
parks.description: You're mysterious and introspective, drawn to what lies beneath the surface. You love dramatic reveals and aren't afraid to look inward to find beauty.

parks.name: Channel Islands
parks.description: You're wild and windswept, thriving in isolated places that demand adventure. You've got the grit for remote exploration and the heart for untouched wilderness.

parks.name: Congaree
parks.description: You're quiet and ancient at heart, moving at your own pace. You love the slow, steady rhythm of nature and appreciate places that most people rush past.

parks.name: Crater Lake
parks.description: You're deep and serene with a striking presence. You love cold climates and dramatic settings, and you're drawn to places that take your breath away with their clarity.

parks.name: Cuyahoga Valley
parks.description: You're accessible and gentle, finding beauty in the everyday. You love bringing people together in green spaces and believe nature should be easy to reach and enjoy.

parks.name: Death Valley
parks.description: You're brutal, surreal, and incredibly resilient. You thrive in extreme conditions and have the grit to push through when others would give up—you're built different.

parks.name: Denali
parks.description: You're untamed, epic, and absolutely humbling. You've got maximum energy and grit, and you're drawn to the wildest, most remote places on Earth. You don't do anything halfway.

parks.name: Dry Tortugas
parks.description: You're isolated and historic, with a love for crystalline waters and remote beauty. You appreciate the journey it takes to reach something truly special.

parks.name: Everglades
parks.description: You're wild and primordial, comfortable in environments that others find intimidating. You embrace the living, breathing chaos of nature and respect its ancient power.

parks.name: Gates of the Arctic
parks.description: You're pure and extreme, seeking total solitude in untouched wilderness. You've got maximum grit and remoteness—you're literally off the map, and that's exactly how you like it.

parks.name: Gateway Arch
parks.description: You're symbolic and social, thriving in urban settings where history meets community. You're all about bringing people together and celebrating human achievement.

parks.name: Glacier
parks.description: You're pristine and powerful, with a dramatic presence that's impossible to ignore. You love cold, alpine settings and have the grit to tackle serious adventures while still being social.

parks.name: Glacier Bay
parks.description: You're monumental and silent, drawn to ancient ice and remote coastal wilderness. You find peace in the quiet power of nature's slowest, most dramatic processes.

parks.name: Grand Canyon
parks.description: You're iconic and overwhelming in the best way. You're social yet rugged, dramatic yet timeless—you're literally a force of nature that leaves everyone speechless.

parks.name: Grand Teton
parks.description: You're sharp, elegant, and bold. You love dramatic mountain scenery and have the energy and grit to tackle serious alpine adventures with style.

parks.name: Great Basin
parks.description: You're quiet and introspective, finding peace under starry skies. You embrace both desert heat and mountain cold, and you're drawn to places that invite contemplation.

parks.name: Great Sand Dunes
parks.description: You're playful and unexpected, thriving where different landscapes collide. You've got kinetic energy and love surprising people with your unique perspective.

parks.name: Great Smoky Mountains
parks.description: You're comforting and welcoming, like a warm hug from nature. You're super social and love bringing people together in misty, peaceful mountain settings.

parks.name: Guadalupe Mountains
parks.description: You're tough, quiet, and resilient. You thrive in remote, desert mountain environments and don't need anyone's approval—you know your worth.

parks.name: Haleakalā
parks.description: You're cosmic and reflective, drawn to sunrise moments that feel otherworldly. You love volcanic drama and appreciate the quiet power of high-altitude contemplation.

parks.name: Hawaiʻi Volcanoes
parks.description: You're alive, creative, and a little dangerous. You thrive on transformation and aren't afraid of chaos—you know that creation and destruction are two sides of the same coin.

parks.name: Hot Springs
parks.description: You're restorative and historic, bringing people together in cozy, healing spaces. You value wellness and community, and you're all about that warm, fuzzy feeling.

parks.name: Indiana Dunes
parks.description: You're playful and accessible, bringing beachy vibes to unexpected places. You're social and breezy, proving that you don't need an ocean to have fun by the water.

parks.name: Isle Royale
parks.description: You're solitary and primal, seeking pure wilderness far from civilization. You've got maximum grit and remoteness—you're comfortable being truly alone with nature.

parks.name: Joshua Tree
parks.description: You're quirky, creative, and resilient. You thrive in unique environments and have the grit to bloom where you're planted, even when conditions are harsh.

parks.name: Katmai
parks.description: You're predatory and primordial, embracing the wild food chain in all its raw power. You love remote wilderness where nature is unfiltered and survival is everything.

parks.name: Kenai Fjords
parks.description: You're epic and crystalline, drawn to dramatic glaciers flowing into the sea. You love cold, remote beauty and appreciate nature's slow, powerful transformations.

parks.name: Kings Canyon
parks.description: You're grand and quiet, with towering presence in remote wilderness. You prefer peaceful solitude over crowds, and you've got serious vertical ambitions.

parks.name: Lake Clark
parks.description: You're vast, wild, and serene all at once. You thrive in remote Alaskan wilderness where water meets mountains, and you're comfortable with extreme solitude.

parks.name: Lassen Volcanic
parks.description: You're geothermal and dynamic, constantly evolving and full of energy. You love volcanic landscapes that bubble, steam, and remind everyone that the earth is alive.

parks.name: Mammoth Cave
parks.description: You're a labyrinth of hidden depths and dark mystery. You're drawn to historic places that go deeper than the surface, literally and figuratively.

parks.name: Mesa Verde
parks.description: You're ancient and architectural, respecting cultures and mysteries of the past. You love arid landscapes that hold stories in their cliffs and ruins.

parks.name: Mount Rainier
parks.description: You're majestic and towering, with a dramatic volcanic presence that commands respect. You love alpine challenges and have the grit to tackle serious elevation.

parks.name: North Cascades
parks.description: You're rugged, isolated, and covered in snow. You thrive in remote alpine wilderness that most people never even attempt to explore—you're the definition of wild.

parks.name: Olympic
parks.description: You're incredibly diverse, comfortable in rainforests, mountains, and coastlines all at once. You're adaptable, lush, and always a little wet—in the best way.

parks.name: Petrified Forest
parks.description: You're prehistoric and striking, with quiet beauty that makes people think. You love ancient, arid landscapes that whisper stories from millions of years ago.

parks.name: Pinnacles
parks.description: You're spiky and adventurous, drawn to hidden places with serious vertical challenges. You love rock climbing and proving that small parks can pack a big punch.

parks.name: Redwood
parks.description: You're towering, ancient, and absolutely majestic. You command respect without saying a word, and your presence is so powerful it makes people feel small—in a good way.

parks.name: Rocky Mountain
parks.description: You're rugged, photogenic, and totally majestic. You love high alpine adventures and have the social energy to share epic mountain experiences with others.

parks.name: Saguaro
parks.description: You're prickly but iconic, thriving in harsh desert heat with your arms held high. You've got the grit to stand tall in arid environments where others would wilt.

parks.name: Sequoia
parks.description: You're a giant in every sense—ancient, majestic, and towering over everything around you. You command respect and have the presence to make people stop and stare in awe.

parks.name: Shenandoah
parks.description: You're misty, accessible, and peaceful. You love bringing people into nature's embrace without being too demanding—you're the gentle introduction to mountain magic.

parks.name: Theodore Roosevelt
parks.description: You're rugged, historic, and windswept. You love wide prairie landscapes and embrace the pioneering spirit of resilience and conservation.

parks.name: Voyageurs
parks.description: You're lake-rich and remote, thriving in water-centered wilderness perfect for paddling. You love northern forests and have the grit for backcountry water adventures.

parks.name: Wind Cave
parks.description: You're a hidden labyrinth beneath the prairie, full of intricate mystery. You love underground beauty and appreciate that the best things are often hidden from view.

parks.name: Wrangell–St. Elias
parks.description: You're vast, epic, and absolutely wild. You're the biggest, remotest, most dramatic version of wilderness—everything about you is maxed out and untamed.

parks.name: Yellowstone
parks.description: You're legendary and diverse, bringing geothermal drama and wildlife together in one iconic package. You're social but still wild at heart—everyone knows your name.

parks.name: Yosemite
parks.description: You're iconic and dramatic, with towering granite walls and thundering waterfalls. You've got the energy for serious adventures and the charisma to draw crowds.

parks.name: Zion
parks.description: You're towering and narrow, creating epic adventures in tight canyon spaces. You've got dramatic energy and the grit to tackle exposed, vertical challenges.

parks.name: Kobuk Valley
parks.description: You're remote and surreal—arctic dunes that shouldn't exist but do. You thrive in extreme isolation where the landscape defies expectations.

parks.name: New River Gorge
parks.description: You're adventurous and fresh, the newest addition to the park family. You love whitewater thrills and proving that adventure doesn't need to be remote to be epic.

parks.name: Virgin Islands
parks.description: You're tropical paradise personified, all snorkeling, beaches, and Caribbean vibes. You're social, warm, and believe life should feel like vacation.

parks.name: White Sands
parks.description: You're surreal and otherworldly, with white dunes that look like another planet. You thrive in dramatic, unusual landscapes that make people question reality.
